result.eng: We had great fun.

result.ponchtml: Ḃí an-ċraic againnWe had great fun.

result.eng: We used to go for walks on the banks of the Liffey.
result.ga: Bhí sé de nós againn dul ag spaisteoireacht ar bhruacha na Life
result.orig: Bhí sé de nós againn dul ag spaisteoireacht ar bhruacha na Life

result.ponchtml: Ḃí sé de nós againn dul ag spaisteoireaċt ar ḃruaċa na LifeWe used to go for walks on the banks of the Liffey.

result.eng: We'll have a meeting tonmorrow.
result.ga: Beidh cruinniú againn amárach

result.html: Beidh cruinniú againn amárachWe'll have a meeting tonmorrow.
result.ponchtml: Beiḋ cruinniú againn amáraċWe'll have a meeting tonmorrow.

result.eng: We'll have a party next week.
result.ga: Beidh cóisir againn an tseachtain seo chugainn
result.orig: Beidh cóisir againn an tseachtain seo chugainn
result.html: Beidh cóisir againn an tseachtain seo chugainnWe'll have a party next week.
result.ponchtml: Beiḋ cóisir againn an tseaċtain seo ċugainnWe'll have a party next week.

result.eng: We'll have a drink in a pub nearby.
result.ga: Beidh deoch againn i dteach tábhairne in aice láimhe
result.orig: Beidh deoch againn i dteach tábhairne in aice láimhe
result.html: Beidh deoch againn i dteach tábhairne in aice láimheWe'll have a drink in a pub nearby.
result.ponchtml: Beiḋ deoċ againn i dteaċ táḃairne in aice láiṁeWe'll have a drink in a pub nearby.

result.eng: Life was different then in the sense that we didn't have modern-day facilities.
result.ga: Bhí an saol difriúil ag an am sa mhéid nach raibh áiseanna na linne seo againn
result.orig: Bhí an saol difriúil ag an am sa mhéid nach raibh áiseanna na linne seo againn

result.eng: We had a meeting with the new director.
result.ga: Bhí cruinniú againn leis an stiúrthóir nua
result.orig: Bhí cruinniú againn leis an stiúrthóir nua
result.html: Bhí cruinniú againn leis an stiúrthóir nuaWe had a meeting with the new director.
result.ponchtml: Ḃí cruinniú againn leis an stiúrṫóir nuaWe had a meeting with the new director.

result.eng: We had difficulties at the start.
result.ga: Bhí deacrachtaí againn ag an tús
result.orig: Bhí deacrachtaí againn ag an tús
result.html: Bhí deacrachtaí againn ag an túsWe had difficulties at the start.
result.ponchtml: Ḃí deacraċtaí againn ag an túsWe had difficulties at the start.

result.eng: That was known to us from the intelligence we received beforehand.
result.ga: Bhí sé sin ar eolas againn ón fhaisnéis a fuair muid roimh ré
result.orig: Bhí sé sin ar eolas againn ón fhaisnéis a fuair muid roimh ré
result.html: Bhí sé sin ar eolas againn ón fhaisnéis a fuair muid roimh réThat was known to us from the intelligence we received beforehand.
result.ponchtml: Ḃí sé sin ar eolas againn ón ḟaisnéis a fuair muid roiṁ réThat was known to us from the intelligence we received beforehand.

result.eng: There is nothing we can do about the power of the media.
result.ga: Níl neart againn ar chumhacht na meán
result.orig: Níl neart againn ar chumhacht na meán
result.html: Níl neart againn ar chumhacht na meánThere is nothing we can do about the power of the media.

result.eng: Although we don’t have a chance, we'll run the race.
result.ga: Cé nach bhfuil seans againn rithfidh muid an rása
result.orig: Cé nach bhfuil seans againn rithfidh muid an rása

result.eng: Every one of us.
result.ga: Gach duine againn
result.orig: Gach duine againn
result.html: Gach duine againnEvery one of us.
result.ponchtml: Gaċ duine againnEvery one of us.

result.eng: It is clear that we have made a mistake.

result.html: Is léir go bhfuil botún déanta againnIt is clear that we have made a mistake.
result.ponchtml: Is léir go ḃfuil botún déanta againnIt is clear that we have made a mistake.

result.eng: We don't often see wild animals.
